thread.title: Symphony is tough: Rex Vijayan
thread.title_full: Symphony is tough: Rex Vijayan - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Symphony is tough: Rex Vijayan
text:
Musician Rex Vijayan is credited for bringing in grunge elements to Malayalam film music.
The Avial rocker though tells us that inculcating symphony orchestra into his music would be a challenge even for him.
"Even if I attempt symphony, I won't do it myself. I will be giving it to someone who knows how to arrange it well. If in the future I have to do such a song, I'd rather associate with someone who knows it and does well rather than me going at it alone," says Rex.
Rex's latest venture was for Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi, which saw him work for director Anil Radhakrishnan Menon the third time after North 24 Kaatham and Saptamashree Thaskaraha.
